## Rehabilitate Runway 12-30 at 14 Wing Greenwood

### Government Tender Announcement

#### Project Overview

Defence Construction Canada (DCC) is soliciting proposals for the rehabilitation of Runway 12-30 at 14 Wing Greenwood, Nova Scotia.

#### Scope of Work

The project includes the supply of labor, materials, supervision, and equipment necessary to rehabilitate the runway. Work includes:

* Removal of existing asphalt pavement and haulage off-site (600 m^2)
* Milling (profiling) of existing asphalt pavement and removal of excess materials (132,300 m^2)
* Common excavation to subgrade (12,300 m^3)
* Subgrade preparation including scarification, compaction, and proofrolling (36,600 m^2)
* Supply and installation of new geotextiles (3,700 m^2)
* Supply, placement, and compaction of new granular base (11,400 m^3)
* Full-depth asphalt patching (1,600 m^2)
* Supply, placement, and compaction of new hot mix asphalt binder course (225,900 m^2)
* Supply, placement, and compaction of new hot mix asphalt surface course (136,000 m^2)
* Runway surface grooving (128,100 m^2)
* Topsoil and hydraulic seeding of disturbed areas (24,000 m^2)
* Balance of project costs (1 lump-sum)

#### Contract Requirements

The successful contractor will be required to hold a valid Designated Organization Screening (DOS) issued by the Contract Security Program (CSP) within Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC).

#### Contract Duration and Timeline

The estimated cost for this project is $20,800,000.00. Work must reach Substantial Completion by October 31, 2024, and be completed by November 30, 2024. No work will take place on site from August 23, 2024, through August 26, 2024, inclusive, due to the airshow.

#### Evaluation Criteria and Selection Process

The contract will be awarded based on the lowest bid that meets all requirements.

#### Bid Submission and Access to Documents

Bidders can access the solicitation documents and submit their bids through the MERX website (http://www.merx.com). Fees may apply; see https://www.merx.com/public/pricing for more information.
